intro: Ouratea neriifolia, commonly known as the black-leaf ouratea, is a flowering plant native to the tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae and is characterized by its evergreen, glossy leaves that are often dark green in color. The plant produces small, fragrant white flowers that bloom in clusters, typically during the wet season. Its ornamental value is due to its attractive foliage and delicate floral display. It is often cultivated as a houseplant or in shaded garden settings.
